mapper.update: update bid_list set debt_id = #{debtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, price_for_sale_rate = #{priceForSaleRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, credit_code = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bid_time = #{bidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where listing_id = #{listingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select listing_id, debt_id, amount, price_for_sale_rate, credit_code, bid_time from bid_list
